name: For The Record
description:
For the Record likes to bring people together who love vinyl and CDs... that's soooo 90s! That can't be bad, right? 

Enjoy old school hip hop with a taste of scratch.

name: Kaaprisun
description:
By bringing a surprising mix of all genres, he always knows how to get everyone partying. In his home village of Lennik and surrounding towns, he has been on every bill. 

Ladies and gentlemen, Kaaprisun will be a sight to behold.

name: Avalonn
description:
In 2015, Avalonn took part in the biggest DJ contest in Belgium, MNM Start To DJ, broadcast on radio station MNM. To summarize: he came, he saw, he conquered. 

Expect to be blown away by rapid mixing!

name: Zomaar Bike
description:
No Zomaar Zomert without the annual mountain bike tour! üö¥ 

The usual ingredients: breathtaking views on the Pajottenland and on the city of Brussels (by night), tough hills, fast descents, technical parts, single tracks, forest roads... 

 We hope to see you there!

name: Zomaar Caf√©
description: Come, drink, eat and enjoy our Zomaar terrace that is open all weekend long! ‚òÄÔ∏èüçπ

name: De Romeo's
description:
VIIIIIVAAAA DE RO-ME-OS! 

Davy, Chris and Gunther are known as De Romeo's and they are loved all over Flanders. Wherever these three gentlemen, preferably in suits, show up, a party is thrown.

name: Wim Soutaer
description:
We genieten van het leveeeeeeeen, aaaa-le-maal! 

A favourite at Zomaar Zomert. Wim Soutaer and Charles Van Domburg bring an act that will blow the roof off the tent. 

One thing is certain. Partying is guaranteed when these gentlemen perform.

name: Uncle Phil
description:
In less than 4 years, Uncle Phil has become a fixture in the cover band scene. With their energetic mix of classic dance tracks alternated with modern top 40 hits, sing-alongs, the right dose of ripping guitars and a bit of humour, this band managed to stand out in an already saturated market. 

Come and see them at Zomaar Zomert 2022!

name: Dimitri Wouters
description:
Dimitri Wouters is a much-loved deejay at festivals, parties and clubs throughout the country. 

As a proud member of the Q-music team he hosts his own weekly radio show on the biggest national radio in Belgium.

name: DJ Creator
description:
If you ask 20-year-old Jean Sauveur a.k.a. DJ Creator to describe his DJ sets, one word will always come up: karaoke! From Natasha Bedingfield to Toto, via Drake and Miley Cyrus: the finalist of MNM Start To DJ 2019 knows how to throw a party. 

Grease up those dancing legs, you'll need them.

name: Twallie
description:
It is impossible for a young person from the Pajot to utter the words 'dikken boit' without mentioning TWALLIE. Finally, there is the clich√© that with this DJ, you can hardly resist your dance moves. But at TWALLIE's set, we love to use this clich√©. 

With his uplifting beats, neither you, nor TWALLIE himself, can keep your legs still.

name: Petanque
description: This year we are once again organising a petanque tournament on Saturday 30 July. Be quick because places are limited! You can subscribe by clicking on the link on the homepage.

name: Zomaar Caf√©
description: Come, drink, eat and enjoy our Zomaar terrace that is open all weekend long! ‚òÄÔ∏èüçπ

name: Zomaar Run
description:
This year we are once again organising the ZomaarRun, a concept that has earned its reputation in the past. 

The 5, 8 or 11 km course will lead you through the nicest little roads of Itterbeek and its surroundings. 

Supply will be provided courtesy of Vondelmolen Peperkoek.

name: Mr. Creezy
description:
He has only one mission: to animate, amuse and make the children laugh! All his animations contain a unique mix of magic, humour, interaction and fun. 

Come see this crazy act!

name: Paella
description:
Sunday afternoon we serve the speciality of the house! Enjoy this Spanish speciality on our sunny terrace which is open all day. 

We try to work in two shifts. You can sign-up for a plate of delicious Paella on our forms. Link is on the homepage!

name: Zomaar Quiz
description:
We welcome all brainiacs, know-it-alls, grammar savvies and burgundians (read: beer drinkers) to our Zomaarquiz! üôå 

We welcome everyone at 19:30 in our festival tent!

name: Kids Park
description:
On Sundays we organise fun activities for the youngest among us. Bouncy castle, volleyball court, crazy clown. 

Perfect for taking a break while the kiddos work off their excess energy!

name: Zomaar Caf√©
description: Come, drink, eat and enjoy our Zomaar terrace that is open all weekend long! ‚òÄÔ∏èüçπ
